title: Quick Honey Soy Chicken Stir Fry
short_description: This stir fry offers a balance of sweet and savory with tender chicken pieces cooked quickly with onion and soy sauce.

steps.title: Preparation of Ingredients
steps.description: Slice the chicken breasts into small dices, and thinly slice the onion. Mix the soy sauce and honey in a small bowl.

steps.title: Marinating the Chicken
steps.description: Season the diced chicken with salt and pepper, then add half of the soy sauce and honey mixture, letting it marinate for 5 minutes.

steps.title: Cook the Chicken
steps.description: Heat the olive oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Add the marinated chicken and saut√© for about 5-7 minutes, or until the chicken is almost fully cooked.

steps.title: Add Aromatics and Sauces
steps.description: Add the minced garlic and sliced onions to the pan, cooking for an additional 3 minutes until onion is tender.

steps.title: Finalize the Dish
steps.description: Pour the remaining soy sauce and honey mixture over the chicken and onions, and stir well. Allow to cook for another 2-3 minutes until everything is heated through and coated with the sauce. Garnish with sesame seeds and chopped green onions if desired.
